class.name: CrowdControlGamePackMeta
class.brief_description: Resource containing Crowd Control game pack metadata.
class.description: CrowdControlGamePackMeta stores metadata about your game for the Crowd Control platform, including the game name, release date, platform, and optional Steam integration.

method.name: to_json
method.description: Converts the metadata to a Dictionary in the format expected by Crowd Control. This is used internally by [CrowdControlGamePack] when exporting.

members.member: Connector types for the game. Defaults to ExternalUnity for standalone games with built-in Crowd Control support.
Description or setup instructions shown next to your game in the Crowd Control app (e.g., "Navigate to Settings -> Crowd Control for setup!").
Name of your game. Can be a String or a Dictionary with "public" and "sort" keys for custom alphabetical sorting.
URL to the game's setup guide. This is typically provided by Crowd Control after your game pack is approved.
Platform the game runs on (e.g., "PC", "PS5", "Xbox Series X").
Release date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Updated when major changes are made to the effect pack.
Steam App ID for your game. If set, Crowd Control can provide a button to launch your game from their app.
